item.title: Johann van Graan responds to accusations from Leicester camp after thumping win
item.description: Munster coach Johann van Graan played down accusations from Leicester counterpart Matt O’Connor that his side were cynical at the breakdown during his side’s comprehensive 33-10 Champions Cup win at Thomond Park. A scintillating opening half-hour laid the basis for the win, tries from Rhys Marshall and Simon Zebo, aided by four successful Ian Keatley kicks, helping Munster build a 20-0 lead which rarely looked like being threatened. Munster Rugby on Youtube.
